content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to check my computer's disk usage with the "df -h" command. The results show that my computer has 24% disk usage.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "learning resources for children"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.learningresources.com/", "https://www.savethechildren.org/us/charity-stories/free-websites-and-apps-to-keep-kids-learning", "https://www.scholastic.com/home", "https://www.learningresources.com/free-at-home-learning-essentials", "https://www.openculture.com/free_k-12_educational_resources", "https://bostonchildrensmuseum.org/learn/learning-resources/", "https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/children/resources?lang=eng", "https://www.metmuseum.org/learn/learning-resources"]', type='action_result')]
"""
